title: Bug 124599 - Shortcut delete and menu delete behave differently in table column
description:
Description: Shortcut delete and menu delete behave differently in table column.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Perform an action (Step 1 details missing)

OB: Shortcut delete and menu delete behave differently in table column.
EB: When performing an undo and then clicking delete in the context menu, both shortcut delete and menu delete should behave in the same way.
SR: The grid in the group header should remain untouched when performing both shortcut delete and menu delete.
